title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + The Art of the Interview
description: A guide on conducting successful interviews, focusing on the basics, such as making it a conversation, being polite and respectful, confident, and to the point. It also covers preparing a game plan, evaluating the interviewee, and knowing when to be quiet.
